_xResult.title: The Devil Made Me Do It
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made jumpsuit slim fit with double ruffle sleeves
_xResult.longdesc:
There are jumpsuits...and then there are jumpsuits that lead you to scandalously good adventures. This bodycon custom made jumpsuit hugs your curves with a sophisticated silhouette and color palette that belies your true intentions. The top has a double ruffle sleeve and detailed lace/stitching. This is a look you can wear for special events like formal dances, cocktail parties, prom, wedding guest and holiday gatherings. 

  • Navy blue is the main color, with black sleeve overlay and accents
  • Round neckline
  • The bodice is decorated with lace and velour ribbons
  • Ruffled chiffon sleeves
  • Slim fit silhouette and pant style, cut to ankle length
  • Hidden zipper on back



Fiber: viscose 50%, elastan-5%, polyester -45%

Sizing notes: Model is wearing a standard size S and inner leg inseam measures 29.91" (76 cm)

properties.propvalue: Spot clean, hand wash or dry clean
